definition: abbr. for Canada 加拿大[Jia1 na2 da4]/surname Jia

to add/plus/(used after an adverb such as 不, 大, 稍 etc, and before a disyllabic verb, to indicate that the action of the verb is applied to sth or sb previously mentioned)/to apply (restrictions etc) to (sb)/to give (support, consideration etc) to (sth)
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure

sentences.english: Do not pressurize or expose to open flame or heat.
sentences.chinese: 不要給空容器加壓，不要放在明火或熱源附近。

sentences.english: Do not misconstrue it as an effort to exert force or pressure.
sentences.chinese: 不要把它誤解爲需要卯盡全力或施加壓力的苦差事。

sentences.english: Cradle it with your left hand and apply slight pressure.
sentences.chinese: 用左手抱住右上臂並對其稍稍加壓。

sentences.english: They also said they would pressure some members who have been overproducing.
sentences.chinese: 他們還表示要向超產的一些成員國施加壓力。

sentences.english: We now have more public opinion exerting pressure on politics than ever before.
sentences.chinese: 現在對政治施加壓力的公衆輿論比以前增多了。

sentences.english: Pressure on the underside of the thighs from an incorrect (too high) seat position makes this worse.
sentences.chinese: 對大腿下面施加壓力的不正確坐姿會使情況更糟。

sentences.english: Pressed Solidification Process Equation of Compatibility.
sentences.chinese: 加壓凝固過程的諧調方程。

sentences.english: Pressure should be applied to bleeding sites such as a de-gloving scalp wound.
sentences.chinese: 應該對下頜部頭皮傷的出血部位進行加壓。

sentences.english: Double lower shapes, 180 degrees turning, lower shape rise to press, and with high efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 雙下模，180度迴轉，下模上頂加壓，工作效率高。

sentences.english: Methods 107 cases of open tibia fracture were treated with compressive external fixation.
sentences.chinese: 方法107例脛骨開放性骨折骨外固定加壓治療。

sentences.english: Apply to conduit pressurization and system of wind sending a platoon.
sentences.chinese: 適用在通道加壓和送排風體系。

sentences.english: The factories have pressurized the farmers into producing more milk.
sentences.chinese: 工廠對農民施加壓力，要他們生產更多的牛奶。

sentences.english: Therefore, aspirin and pneumatic compression devices are acceptable for TKA patients.
sentences.chinese: 因此，阿斯匹林和氣動加壓靴可用於TKA患者。

sentences.english: The elastic nature of the condom also adds pressure to the mix.
sentences.chinese: 套套的彈性還可以在這些碎布上施加壓力。
不要施加壓力，不要受制於人。

sentences.english: High pressure trunk injection can supply mineral elements into the fruit trees.
sentences.chinese: 主幹加壓注射法可有效地補充樹體礦質元素。

definition: to eliminate dust (i.e. filter out suspended particles)
to restore sth to its original state
radiator (for heating a room)/radiator (for cooling an engine)
